body.name: ROVSUN 15LBS Portable Washing Machine, Electric Washer and Dryer Combo with Washer(9lbs) & Spiner(6lbs) & Built-in Pump Draining for Home RV Camping Dorm College Apartment
features: 【Washing Capacity & Specifications】Total capacity:15 lbs(washer:9 lbs, spin cycle:6 lbs). Overall dimensions: 26.57* 13.98* 23.23 inches. Power supply: 110v/60hz, Total power: 420w(wash:300w/dry:250w). Easy operation design and easily movable

【Timer Control & Powerful Performance】Separate timer control for wash and spin operations. Wash timer for 15 min and spin timer for 5 minutes per load, You can set the time according to the amount of your clothes ,this unit features a 1300RPM powerful motor with a max frequency of 60Hz. Save your time and wash more clean

【Easy Operation】 Simple design of the operation panel, wash timing, wash options, drain options, and spin timing, more easier to use. Allows you to simply put in your load of clothes, fill with water, set the timer and start washing, completely suitable for everywhere
【Built-in Drain Pump】Equipped with a built-in drainage pump, the machine can quickly discharge the water from the tub; It is uitable for most family. Easy storage and space saving design

【Customer Care】 To ensure a 100% customer satisfaction, we provide 1 year warranty on machine. We are confident to stand behind our product and would like to guarantee you a best shopping experience upright position for 24 hours.)
body.description: Features:1. Mini and compact size with large power2. Stainless steel washing dewatering cylinder for its upgrade quality3. New and high quality4. Help to wash clothes quickly5. 8lbs rated washing capacity, it can wash a lot of clothes at the same time6. Fine workmanship without noise7. Washing and dehydration functions can be used at the same time8. Built-in drain pump drains dirty water by more longer drainage tube from washer Specifications:1. Color: White & Blue2. Power Supply: 110V/60Hz3. Total Capacity 15LB (9Lb Washing Capacity & 6Lb Spin Capacity)4. Motor Speed: 1300rpm/mins5. Rated Wash Input Power: 300W6. Rated Spin Input Power: 250W7. Total Power: 550W8. Dimensions: (23.23 x 13.98 x 26.57)" (L x W x H)9. Weight: 24.25lbs Package Includes:1 x Twin Tube Washing Machine with Built-in Drain Pump1 x Water Inlet1 x Drain Pipe Notes: The machine will be filled with water for quality testing before leaving the factory. Although it is wiped and dried, it is still difficult to avoid some residual water in individual machines. Please clean the machine as soon as you receive it and use it with confidence.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little washer
reviews.reviewText: Had one of these back in the 50's for baby clothes but you had to wring out the closes, empty out water by hand and rinse. Those had no spin cycle. Decided to check the newer ones out and found this one. It holds more clothes than I thought it would, was quiet and the spin cycle worked well. I live alone and have a few really small load of things like "black" clothes, too few to put in my big super washing machine.I set it up in the bathtub in a bath room that the tub is never used Excuse the appearance of the old tub but original bath was built in 1951. Over the years, I have only used this old cast iron tub for bathing my large hairy dog, thus tub is stained. This tub already had a hose attached to facet and perfect for filling up this washer. Placed washer on two 2 x 4 blocks of wood so that it is elevated off tub floor to prevent water when washer is draining from getting into bottom of tub. Placed a screen in drain to catch lint. Have a GFI outlet in this bathroom and cord was long enough to reach. I am amazed at how many items I can get into washer and it agitates clothes well. It does sometimes tangle clothes but I just stop washer and straighten them out. I sometimes reset washer timer to go another 15 min wash. The spin cycle is great but have to spin in two groups of washed clothes as the spin basket only holds one half of washed clothes. Viverates a little when spin cycle starts so I just hold machine to keep it from moving off the wood 2x4's. It levels out in about 60 seconds and does spin water out until clothes are damp dry. Item did not say the spin would stop when you opened the lid during spin but this one does, re-starts when lid is closed again.I really like this little washer, I could see where it would be great for campers and small apartment with no washer available or if you had to go into a basement washroom. I can no longer climb the steps. Also if my regular washer gives out. It would give me time to shop around.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great small washer/spinner
reviews.reviewText: These tiny washer - spinner machines are common in the Philippines which is where I first saw them. After having to downsize, my condo had a small space in my kitchen near the water faucet and drain. This unit fits perfectly in that space whereas a larger standard washer wouldn't. It's very easy to manually fill with hot or cold water and the built in pump allows it to drain above floor level. The electrical components are very reliable and simple, so no issues with complex logic boards malfunctioning. The spinner side holds about 1/2 the washer side load but each dry cycle is only around 4 minutes, so pretty quick. I don't have room for a standard dryer so I just hang my clothes on a clothes rack in my living room and they are dry the next day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does what it promises.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for some extended travels over a few months where I will be driving from state to state, and will not always have access to a full size unit.What I like is that it works as described, and cleans my clothes. It's light and easy to move. The spin works really well and really gets the clothes almost dry, to the point I was surprised.For me, the downsides are; It requires a lot of user attention to get through a load or several loads. The spinner holds about half of what the washer holds, so after your first wash, you move half to the spinner and let it spin, then find a place to put those clothes while you load and spin the second half. then put them all back in the washer for the rinse, followed by a second series of the same thing...for each small load. That being said, I knew all that when ordering, and so it's more that I am disappointed after experiencing what it's actually like to wash with this, but they were clear about what I was getting. It would have been MUCH better to have the spinner of the same capacity as the washer. And even better if they were both the same thing, but they have those, and I didn't buy one because this was cheaper and more portable.Other notes are that when you start the spin, you have to hold the unit steady while it spins up to full speed. Once it's at full speed it's fine, but getting there involves a lot of vibration and it moves all around. Mine also occasionally makes a grindy/clicky noise for a few seconds during the wash. I hope this is normal operation, and not an indication of something about to break. If it does break, I'll update this. I'm not sure what the supply hose is supposed to fit on. Not any faucet or hose valve I have in my house or have ever seen for sure. Maybe something that is standard in Asia?? But I just fill it with a garden hose and that works fine, and is probably faster too. Finally, it's not exactly a water saving type of washer.BUT, like I mentioned at the start, I got exactly what was promised, and it should work fine for my needs. But it's not something I would buy for long term use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars absolutely worth every penny !
reviews.reviewText: we have done about 10 loads of laundry so far and it works amazing. i wish the draining and filling the water was a little bit easier but it works amazing 10/10 recommend.
